displayName.japanese: 新たな家、懐かしい冒険

description.brazilian: Bem-vindo ao Mundo Mágico.
description.english: Welcome to the magic world
description.french: Bienvenue dans le monde de la magie
description.german: Willkommen in der Magischen Welt
description.italian: Benvenuto nel Mondo Magico
description.japanese: 魔法の世界へようこそ
description.polish: Witamy w Magicznym Świecie
description.russian: Добро пожаловать в мир магии.
description.schinese: 欢迎来到魔法世界
description.spanish: Bienvenido al Mundo Mágico

description.brazilian: Tente não morrer durante a missão principal.
description.english: Your main quest starts here
description.french: Essaie de rester en vie pendant la quête principale.
description.german: Versuche, während der Hauptquest nicht zu sterben
description.italian: Cerca di non morire durante la quest principale
description.japanese: メインクエストで死なないようにしよう
description.koreana: 메인 퀘스트 도중에 죽지 않게 조심하세요
description.polish: Postaraj się nie zginąć, wykonując zadanie główne
description.russian: Постарайтесь не умереть в ходе главного квеста.
description.schinese: 尝试一命通关主线故事吧
description.spanish: Intenta no morir durante la misión principal

description.brazilian: Você é (quase) um mago, Simon.
description.english: You're (almost) a wizard, Simon
description.french: Tu es (presque) un sorcier, Simon.
description.german: Du bist (beinahe) ein Zauberer, Simon
description.italian: Sei (quasi) un mago, Simon
description.japanese: （あとちょっとで）君は魔術師だ、サイモン
description.polish: Szymku, jesteś już (prawie) czarodziejem
description.russian: Ты (почти) волшебник, Саймон.
description.schinese: 你已经（基本算）是个巫师了，西蒙
description.spanish: Ya eres (casi) un mago, Simon

displayName.brazilian: Magia, quadros falantes e outros clichês
displayName.english: Magic, talking pictures and other clichés
displayName.italian: Magia, quadri parlanti e altri cliché
displayName.japanese: 魔法、喋る絵画、その他のお約束
displayName.koreana: 마법, 말하는 그림, 그 외 여러 클리셰
displayName.polish: Magia, gadające obrazy i inne nudziarstwa
displayName.russian: Магия, говорящие картины и другие штампы
displayName.schinese: 魔法、画中人与其他俗套之物
displayName.spanish: Magia, cuadros parlantes y otros clichés

description.brazilian: Isso é só o começo.
description.english: And so it begins
description.french: Et ce n'est que le début.
description.german: Und so beginnt es
description.italian: Ed è solo l'inizio
description.japanese: こうしてすべては始まった
description.polish: No i się zaczyna
description.russian: И это только начало!
description.schinese: 就这样开始了
description.spanish: Y esto es solo el principio

displayName.japanese: ダンジョン・ブレイク

description.brazilian: Parabéns, você derrubou dois trolls em algumas horas.
description.english: You knocked out two trolls in a couple of hours, nice one
description.french: Tu as assommé deux trolls en quelques heures, bien joué.
description.german: Du hast zwei Trolle innerhalb weniger Stunden ausgeschaltet. Gut gemacht!
description.italian: Hai steso due troll in poche ore, complimenti
description.japanese: こんなに早くトロールを2体も倒すとは（やるね！）
description.koreana: 몇 시간 안에 트롤을 둘이나 쓰러뜨렸군요, 잘했습니다
description.polish: W kilka godzin załatwiłeś dwa trolle, nieźle
description.russian: Вырубить двух троллей за пару часов? Неплохо!
description.schinese: 你在几小时内放倒了两个巨魔，干得漂亮
description.spanish: Has dejado grogui a dos trols en un par de horas, bravo

displayName.japanese: グランド・セフト・ボート

description.brazilian: O Sordid não vai se importar muito, né?
description.english: I'm sure Sordid won't mind too much
description.french: Je suis sûr que ça ne gênera pas trop Sordide.
description.german: Sordid würde das bestimmt nichts ausmachen
description.italian: Sono certo che Sordid non se la prenderà troppo
description.japanese: ソルディドは許してくれるさ
description.polish: Sordid nie będzie miał nic przeciwko
description.russian: Вряд ли Сордид будет сильно против.
description.schinese: 索迪德肯定不会太介意的
description.spanish: Estoy seguro de que a Sórdido no le preocupa mucho

displayName.japanese: 泥のような、繊細な後味

description.brazilian: Você sobreviveu a uma missão enfadonha (e a um ensopado terrível).
description.english: You survived a dreaded fetch quest (and a terrible stew)
description.french: Tu as survécu à une quête de récupération (et à un horrible ragoût).
description.german: Du hast eine gefürchtete Suchquest (und einen grauenhaften Eintopf) überlebt
description.italian: Sei sopravvissuto a una fetch quest (e a un pessimo stufato)
description.japanese: 過酷な雑用クエスト（とひどいシチュー）を生き延びた
description.koreana: 끔찍한 물건 가져오기 퀘스트에서 살아남았습니다 (끔찍한 스튜에서도)
description.polish: Spełniłeś rolę chłopca na posyłki i zjadłeś okropny gulasz
description.russian: Вы справились с противным квестом типа
description.schinese: 你成功完成了惊险刺激的跑腿任务（还尝试了恐怖的炖菜）
description.spanish: Has sobrevivido a una temible misión (y a un guiso horrible)

displayName.japanese: もっと酔っ払い魔術師

description.brazilian: Tem certeza que você não é o antagonista?
description.english: Are you sure you're not the antagonist?
description.french: Ce ne serait pas toi, l'ennemi principal ?
description.german: Bist du sicher, dass du nicht der Antagonist bist?
description.italian: Sei proprio sicuro di non essere tu l'antagonista?
description.japanese: 君、本当に主人公？
description.polish: Na pewno nie jesteś tutaj tym złym?
description.russian: А вы точно не главный злодей?
description.schinese: 你确定你不是反派吗？
description.spanish: ¿Estás seguro de que no eres el antagonista?

description.brazilian: Pelo menos você tentou.
description.english: At least you tried
description.french: Tu as essayé, c'est déjà ça.
description.german: Immerhin hast du es versucht
description.italian: Almeno ci hai provato
description.japanese: 努力は認める
description.polish: Przynajmniej próbowałeś
description.russian: Вы пытались.
description.schinese: 至少你尽力了
description.spanish: Al menos lo has intentado

description.brazilian: Você sempre pode contar com a ajuda dos seus amigos (terríveis).
description.english: You can always count on the help of your (terrible) friends
description.french: Tu peux toujours compter sur l'aide de tes (pires) amis.
description.german: Du kannst dich stets auf die Hilfe deiner (schrecklichen) Freunde verlassen
description.italian: Puoi sempre contare sull'aiuto dei tuoi (pessimi) amici
description.japanese: （最低な）友達はいつでも頼りになる
description.polish: Zawsze możesz liczyć na pomoc swoich (okropnych) przyjaciół
description.russian: Ваши (ужасные) друзья всегда придут на помощь!
description.schinese: 你永远可以信任你的（恐怖）朋友
description.spanish: Siempre puedes contar con la ayuda de tus (horribles) amigos

displayName.brazilian: A criança insolente de outro mundo
displayName.english: The impudent child from another world
displayName.french: Le Gamin insolent dun autre monde
displayName.german: Ein vorlautes Kind aus einer anderen Welt
displayName.japanese: 異世界より喚ばれし生意気な子
displayName.schinese: 异世来客显身形，无礼小儿现此地
displayName.spanish: El crío insolente de otro mundo

description.brazilian: Você terminou sua aventura, agora é só aguardar os créditos.
description.english: You've completed your adventure, now wait for the credits
description.french: Tu as terminé l'aventure, maintenant attends les crédits.
description.german: Du hast dein Abenteuer abgeschlossen, jetzt musst du nur noch auf die Credits warten
description.italian: Hai completato la tua avventura, ora aspetta i titoli di coda
description.japanese: 冒険は終わった、あとはスタッフロールだけだ
description.koreana: 모험을 마쳤으니 이제 엔딩 크레딧을 감상하세요
description.polish: Przygoda ukończona, teraz poczekaj na napisy końcowe
description.russian: Приключение закончилось! Ждите, когда пойдут титры.
description.schinese: 你已经完成了冒险，准备看制作人员表吧
description.spanish: Has completado tu aventura, ahora espera a los créditos

description.brazilian: O círculo se fechou.
description.english: The circle has closed
description.french: La boucle est bouclée.
description.german: Der Kreis hat sich geschlossen
description.italian: Il cerchio si è chiuso
description.japanese: 終わりは始まり
description.polish: Koło się zamknęło
description.russian: Круг замкнулся.
description.schinese: 完成闭环
description.spanish: El círculo se ha cerrado

description.brazilian: Não pense demais sobre isso, pelo menos você curtiu um ótimo jogo.
description.english: Don't think about it too much, at least you found a great game
description.french: N'y pense pas trop, au moins, tu as trouvé un super jeu.
description.german: Mach dir nicht zu viele Gedanken darüber, immerhin hast du ein tolles Spiel gefunden
description.italian: Non pensarci troppo, almeno hai trovato un gran bel gioco
description.japanese: いいゲームなんだから、細かいことはどうでもいいじゃないか
description.koreana: 너무 깊게 생각하지 마세요. 그래도 명작을 찾았잖아요
description.polish: Nie łam sobie głowy, przynajmniej znalazłeś świetną grę
description.russian: Не задумывайтесь, просто порадуйтесь, что нашли хорошую игру.
description.schinese: 不用想那么多，至少你发现了一个好游戏
description.spanish: No le des muchas vueltas, al menos has encontrado un buen juego

displayName.japanese: 簡単コスプレアイテム

description.brazilian: É melhor não vestir isso.
description.english: Don't try it on for size
description.french: N'essaie pas, pour voir.
description.german: Besser nicht anziehen
description.italian: Non provare a indossarla
description.japanese: 試着はやめとけ
description.polish: Nie próbuj tego nosić
description.russian: Не пытайтесь примерить.
description.schinese: 别为了试大小而穿上身
description.spanish: No le des ni una oportunidad

description.brazilian: É melhor nunca mais usar isso de novo.
description.english: Best never to use it again
description.french: Mieux vaut ne plus jamais l'utiliser.
description.german: Das sollte nie mehr benutzt werden
description.italian: Meglio non usarla mai più
description.japanese: 2度と使わないほうがいい
description.polish: Lepiej tego więcej nie robić
description.russian: Лучше ее больше не использовать.
description.schinese: 最好还是别再用了
description.spanish: Es mejor no usarla jamás

description.brazilian: Eu também prefiro andar em vez de me teletransportar.
description.english: I prefer walking to teleporting too
description.french: Moi aussi, je préfère la marche à la téléportation.
description.german: Auch ich gehe lieber zu Fuß, als zu teleportieren
description.italian: Anche io preferisco le passeggiate al teletrasporto
description.japanese: 瞬間移動より徒歩のほうが好き
description.polish: Ja też wolę chodzenie od teleportacji
description.russian: Тоже предпочитаю ходить, а не телепортироваться.
description.schinese: 我也一样，相比于传送，我更喜欢走路
description.spanish: Yo también prefiero caminar en lugar de teletransportarme

description.brazilian: Você tem bastante tempo a perder.
description.english: You have plenty of time to waste
description.french: Tu as plein de temps à perdre.
description.german: Du hast mehr als genug Zeit zu vergeuden
description.italian: Ne hai di tempo da perdere
description.japanese: いくらでも時間をつぶすといい
description.polish: Masz najwyraźniej dużo wolnego czasu
description.russian: У вас полно лишнего времени.
description.schinese: 你有大把时间可以挥霍
description.spanish: Tienes mucho tiempo libre

description.brazilian: Cabe de tudo mesmo nesse chapéu.
description.english: That hat really can hold anything
description.french: Ce chapeau contient vraiment de tout.
description.german: In dem Hut findet wirklich alles Platz
description.italian: Quel cappello può davvero contenere di tutto
description.japanese: あの帽子にはなんでも入る
description.koreana: 저 모자에는 안 들어가는 게 없군요
description.polish: Ten kapelusz naprawdę pomieści wszystko
description.russian: В это шляпу что угодно влезет!
description.schinese: 这顶帽子真的什么都能装
description.spanish: Sí que caben cosas en ese sombrero

description.brazilian: Não se preocupe, não é aquele tipo de aventura.
description.english: Don't worry, it's not that kind of adventure
description.french: Rassure-toi, ce n'est pas ce genre d'aventure.
description.german: Keine Sorge, es handelt sich nicht um diese Art von Abenteuer
description.italian: Tranquilli, non è quel tipo di adventure
description.japanese: そういう冒険じゃないから大丈夫
description.koreana: 걱정 마세요, 이건 그런 게임 아닙니다
description.polish: Spokojnie, to nie taki rodzaj przygody
description.russian: Не волнуйтесь, это не такое приключение.
description.schinese: 不必担心，这趟冒险的要求并不高
description.spanish: Tranquilo, no es ese tipo de aventura

description.brazilian: Tome mais cuidado ao usar um item.
description.english: Be more careful when using an item
description.french: Fais plus attention quand tu utilises un objet.
description.german: Sei vorsichtiger, wenn du einen Gegenstand verwendest
description.italian: Fai più attenzione quando usi un oggetto
description.japanese: アイテムを使う時はもっと注意して
description.koreana: 좀 더 신중하게 아이템을 사용해주시면 좋겠네요
description.polish: Musisz bardziej uważać, używając przedmiotów
description.russian: Используйте предметы внимательнее.
description.schinese: 使用物品的时候千万要小心
description.spanish: Sé más cuidadoso al usar un objeto

description.brazilian: Eu só quero botar fogo no Mundo Mágico.
description.english: I just want to set the Magic World on fire
description.french: Attention à ne pas mettre le feu au monde de la magie.
description.german: Ich will doch nur die Magische Welt in Flammen stecken
description.italian: Cerca di non dare alle fiamme tutto il mondo magico
description.japanese: 魔法界に火をつけたいだけさ
description.koreana: 그저 마법세계에 불을 지르고 싶었을 뿐입니다
description.polish: Chcę patrzeć, jak cały Magiczny Świat płonie
description.russian: Я просто хочу увидеть мир магии в огне.
description.schinese: 我只是想让魔法世界火一把
description.spanish: Solo quiero ver arder el Mundo Mágico

description.brazilian: Obrigado por resolver o problema na Biblioteca.
description.english: Thanks for fixing the problem in the Library
description.french: Merci d'avoir réglé le problème à la bibliothèque.
description.german: Danke, dass du dich um das Problem in der Bibliothek gekümmert hast
description.italian: Grazie per aver sistemato il problema nella Biblioteca
description.japanese: 図書室の問題を解決してくれてありがとう
description.polish: Dzięki za rozwiązanie problemu w bibliotece
description.russian: Спасибо, что решили проблему в библиотеке!
description.schinese: 感谢你解决了图书馆的异变
description.spanish: Gracias por arreglar el problema de la biblioteca

description.brazilian: Parabéns, você destruiu uma relíquia antiga.
description.english: Congratulations, you have destroyed an ancient relic
description.french: Félicitation, tu as détruit une très vieille relique.
description.german: Glückwunsch, du hast ein uraltes Relikt zerstört
description.italian: Complimenti, hai distrutto una reliquia antichissima
description.japanese: おめでとう、古代の遺物を破壊したね
description.polish: Gratulacje, zniszczyłeś starożytną relikwię
description.russian: Поздравляем, вы уничтожили древнюю реликвию.
description.schinese: 恭喜，你成功摧毁了一个古代遗物
description.spanish: Enhorabuena, has destruido una reliquia antigua

description.brazilian: Você nunca vai precisar de atalhos.
description.english: You will never need shortcuts
description.french: Tu n'auras jamais besoin de raccourcis.
description.german: Damit bist du nie wieder auf Abkürzungen angewiesen
description.italian: Non avrai mai bisogno di scorciatoie
description.japanese: もう近道を探す必要はない
description.polish: Już nigdy nie będziesz potrzebować skrótów
description.russian: Да кому нужны короткие пути?
description.schinese: 你从来都不需要抄近道
description.spanish: Nunca necesitarás atajos

description.brazilian: De onde vieram aquelas coisas?!
description.english: Where did those things come from?!
description.french: Mais doù ça sort, tout ça ?!
description.german: Wo kommen die Dinger denn her?!
description.italian: Da dove vengono quegli affari?!
description.japanese: これ全部どこから来たんだ！？
description.polish: Skąd się to wszystko wzięło?!
description.russian: Откуда взялись эти штуки?!
description.schinese: 那些东西是从哪儿来的？！
description.spanish: ¡¿De dónde vienen esas cosas?!

description.brazilian: Isso não faz você se sentir melhor?
description.english: Doesn't that give you a warm, fuzzy feeling?
description.french: Tu ne te sens pas meilleur, tout d'un coup ?
description.german: Gibt er dir nicht ein warmes, kuscheliges Gefühl?
description.italian: Non ti senti anche tu meglio?
description.japanese: なんだか温かい気持ちになるね
description.koreana: 따스한 빛이 몸을 감싸는 게 느껴지나요?
description.polish: Czy to nie jest naprawdę miłe?!
description.russian: Окутывает теплом и спокойствием, не правда ли?
description.schinese: 有没有暖洋洋、软蓬蓬的感觉吗？
description.spanish: ¿No sientes una calidez electrizante?

description.brazilian: Não se preocupe, o Simon não será possuído por uma entidade sombria... eu acho.
description.english: Don't worry, Simon won't get possessed by a dark deity...I think
description.french: Pas d'inquiétude, Simon ne sera pas possédé par une divinité obscure... je crois.
description.german: Keine Sorge, Simon wird nicht von einer dunklen Gottheit besessen werden ... glaube ich
description.italian: Non preoccuparti, Simon non verrà posseduto da una oscura divinità...credo
description.japanese: サイモンは昏き神に乗っ取られたりはしない… たぶん
description.koreana: 걱정 마세요. 사이먼에게 어둠의 신이 빙의하지는 않을 겁니다. 아마도요
description.polish: Bez obaw, Szymku, może nie opęta cię żadne mroczne bóstwo…
description.russian: Не волнуйтесь, никакое темное божество Саймона не захватит… я так думаю.
description.schinese: 不必担心，西蒙不会被黑暗之神附体的…应该不会吧
description.spanish: No te preocupes, no hay deidades oscuras que puedan poseer a Simon... creo

description.brazilian: Acerto crítico!
description.english: Critical strike!
description.french: Coup critique !
description.german: Kritischer Treffer!
description.italian: Colpo critico!
description.japanese: クリティカルヒットだ！
description.polish: Trafienie krytyczne!
description.russian: Критический удар!
description.schinese: 致命一击！
description.spanish: ¡Golpe crítico!

description.brazilian: Quebrar a quarta parede nunca foi um problema.
description.english: Breaking the fourth wall has never been a problem
description.french: Briser le quatrième mur n'a jamais été un problème.
description.german: Die vierte Wand zu durchbrechen, war noch nie ein Problem
description.italian: La quarta parete non è mai stata un problema
description.japanese: 第4の壁を壊すのはいつものこと
description.polish: Burzenie czwartej ściany to żaden problem
description.russian: Ломаем четвертую стену без проблем!
description.schinese: 打破第四面墙没什么大不了的
description.spanish: Romper la cuarta pared nunca ha sido un problema

description.brazilian: Você e eu sabemos que isso não é um spoiler.
description.english: You and I both know that's not a spoiler
description.french: On sait tous les deux que ce n'est pas un spoiler.
description.german: Wir beide wissen, dass das kein Spoiler ist
description.italian: Sappiamo entrambi che non è uno spoiler
description.japanese: ネタバレじゃないって、わかってるよね？
description.polish: Wiadomo, że to żaden spojler
description.russian: И мы оба знаем, что это не спойлер.
description.schinese: 你我都清楚，这不是剧透
description.spanish: Tanto tú como yo sabemos que eso no es un spoiler

description.brazilian: O Mundo Mágico não é mais um mistério para você.
description.english: The Magic World is no longer a mystery to you
description.french: Le monde de la magie n'a plus de secrets pour toi.
description.german: Die Magische Welt ist nicht länger ein Mysterium für dich
description.italian: Il mondo magico non è più un mistero per te
description.japanese: 魔法界を隅から隅まで知り尽くした
description.polish: Magiczny Świat nie ma już przed tobą tajemnic
description.russian: В мире магии для вас больше нет тайн.
description.schinese: 在你眼中，魔法世界已不再神秘
description.spanish: El Mundo Mágico ya no es un misterio para ti

displayName.japanese: 原初の魔術師を継ぐ者

description.brazilian: Nada mau para um pirralho insolente.
description.english: Not bad for an impudent child
description.french: Pas mal, pour un gamin insolent.
description.german: Nicht übel für einen vorlauten Bengel
description.italian: Non male per un bamboccio
description.japanese: 生意気な子供にしては悪くない
description.polish: Nieźle jak na takiego bezczelnego chłopca
description.russian: А 'дерзкое дитя' хорошо справляется!
description.schinese: 就无礼小儿而言，干得不错
description.spanish: Nada mal para un crío insolente

displayName.japanese: たった5分でこのありさま

description.brazilian: Não demorou muito para causar confusão. Parabéns!
description.english: It didn't take you long to cause chaos. Result!
description.french: Il ne t'a pas fallu longtemps pour semer le bazar. C'est fait !
description.german: Du hast nicht lange gebraucht, um Chaos zu stiften. Glückwunsch!
description.italian: Non ci hai messo molto per combinare disastri, complimenti
description.japanese: あっという間にこのカオスな状態を作り出してしまった！
description.koreana: 혼돈을 일으키는 데에는 그리 오래 걸리지 않았습니다!
description.polish: Szybko udało ci się rozpętać chaos. Brawo!
description.russian: Быстро вы начали сеять хаос. Успех!
description.schinese: 惹祸多简单，分分钟搞定！
description.spanish: No has tardado mucho en desatar el caos. ¡Bravo!
